content.question: Gerry made which of the following arguments in the excerpt about the Articles of Confederation?

choices.label: The Articles needed to be amended to make slavery illegal.
The Articles were mostly effective at funding the central government.
The problems of the Articles could not be fixed by the state delegates.
The state governments should be given increased power under the Articles.

content.answer: The problems of the Articles could not be fixed by the state delegates.
